content: -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **rye light** - by tin can knits ============ -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **the rye light pattern is now available in the free tin can knits app ** click here to download the app or to learn more 1 only see the size instructions you need tick through the pattern and make notes support is just a tap away adjust the settings to suit you ***learn to knit with alexa and emily the rye light socks are part of the simple collection 2 - a learn to knit series with excellent free patterns and clear tutorials *** from your first scarf to mittens socks and sweaters learn all you need to know to make modern seamless knits for the entire family **want to keep up with tin can knits ** sign up for our email updates 3 and we will let you know about our new designs 4 and great in-depth tutorials 5 -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **pattern info** ============ *note looking for a heavier weight version of these socks check out the rye 6 sock pattern * **sizing** newborn baby toddler child **adult s m l** finished cuff/foot circumference 4 25 5 5 75 6 5 **7 25 8 8 75** around unstretched leg 2 2 5 4 5 5 5 **6 5 7 5 8** from cast-on to start of heel flap adjustable foot 3 25 4 5 25 7 25 **8 25 9 75 11 5** from back of heel to toe adjustable **yarn** 90 110 160 220 **300 380 480** yards sock / fingering weight yarn * samples shown in sunshine yarns luxury sock 7 in be still leaf jumping and pumpkin bread * **gauge** 32 sts and 46 rounds/ 4 in stockinette stitch on larger needles **needles** us #1 / 2 25mm dpns or circular for magic loop us #2 / 2 75mm dpns or circular for magic loop * or as required to meet gauge * **notions** stitch markers darning needle **helpful tutorials** let s knit socks 8 -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- for all pattern abbreviations techniques and to contact us visit www tincanknits com 9 -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- 1 https //tincanknits com/app 2 http //tincanknits com/thesimplecollection html 3 http //eepurl com/k5p8l 4 http //tincanknits com/ 5 http //tincanknits com/techniques html 6 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/rye-worsted 7 https //www ravelry com/yarns/library/sunshine-yarns-luxury-sock 8 http //blog tincanknits com/2013/10/03/socks/ 9 http //www tincanknits com
